summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Operation Eden animation rollout. All pages display correctly with AAA game-level UI animations (glow-breathe, scale-pulse, fade-in-up, stagger, shimmer, spin-slow, float). Dark tactical theme (zinc-900/950 with orange-500 accents) is consistently applied. All navigation works correctly. No critical console errors.
critical_code_review_comments: All animation classes working correctly: animate-glow-breathe, animate-scale-pulse, animate-fade-in-up, animate-spin-slow, animate-float, stagger-item
Login page: Animated background with glowing Eden logo (animate-glow-breathe), tactical theme with grid pattern
Dashboard: Staggered stat cards (8 items), Battle Pass widget with glowing badge icon, Mission Log, Quick Deploy cards
Battle Pass: XP orb spinning (animate-spin-slow), tier badges with stagger animation, glow effects on unlocked badges only (by design)
Claims/Garden: Header with text-glow-orange, 229 stagger-item rows, interactive-card hover effects working
Contracts: Animated floating contracts icon, staggered stat cards, tactical card styling
Agent Eve: badge-icon with animate-glow-breathe on Eve icon, text-glow-blue on header, chat interface functional
Sidebar: Operation Eden logo with animate-glow-breathe, nav items with scale-pulse on active state, chevron fade-in-left
Top header: Target icon with animate-scale-pulse, shimmer on sector name breadcrumb
Transparent badge icons stored in /public/icons/ with drop shadows working correctly

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All pages display correctly with animations

context_for_next_testing_agent: Animation rollout verified across entire Operation Eden app. All CSS animations defined in index.css (lines 367-564) are working. Badge icons from /public/icons/ display with transparent backgrounds and drop shadows. Key animation classes: animate-glow-breathe (logo, badges), animate-scale-pulse (active nav icons, Target icons), stagger-item (lists/grids), animate-float (legendary badges), animate-spin-slow (XP orb), badge-icon-glow/badge-icon-spin (tier badges when unlocked).

Login Page.details: Operation Eden branding with glowing logo, dark tactical theme, corner accents on login card

animations_verified: stagger-item (8 stat cards + mission log items)
Dashboard.details: COMMAND CENTER header, stat cards with hover bounce, Battle Pass widget, Mission Log with claim items

Battle Pass.details: Tier grid with proper rarity colors, locked tiers show lock icons (correct behavior), unlocked badges get glow effects

Claims/Garden.details: THE GARDEN header with glow, claim rows with hover effects, filter buttons with tactical styling

Contracts.details: CONTRACTS header with animated icon, stat cards for Total/Signed/Pending/Draft, template cards

Agent Eve.details: AGENT EVE header with blue glow, Eve icon with breathing glow, chat interface functional

Claim Details.details: Claim number with glow, MISSION INTEL card, Client Status stepper, Quick Deploy panel

Sidebar Navigation.details: Operation Eden branding, Tactical Ops subtitle, green status dot with pulse

minor: WebSocket error: Event - Non-critical, related to hot reload or real-time features
GPS Error: User denied Geolocation - Expected in testing environment, user permission required
404 errors - Likely favicon or non-critical resource requests

mocked_apis_list: /api/battle-pass - hardcoded data as noted by main agent

fade_animations.animate-fade-in-up: Used on page headers and content sections
fade_animations.animate-fade-in-left: Used on chevrons when nav item is active

glow_animations.animate-glow-breathe: Used on logo, badge icons, and important elements
glow_animations.text-glow-blue: Used on Agent Eve title (blue theme)

motion_animations.animate-scale-pulse: Used on active nav icons, Target icons, status dots
motion_animations.animate-bounce-gentle: Used on hover states for icons

stagger_animations.stagger-item: Used on lists and grids with cascading entrance (0.05s delay per item)

utility_animations.animate-shimmer: Used on sector name in breadcrumb
utility_animations.interactive-card: Used on claim rows for hover lift effect
